mapper.select: select b.*, u.* from BD_free b left join user_info u on b.user_id = u.user_id where bd_category = #{bd_category}

select ev.*, u.user_name from (select rownum rn, e.* from (select * from BD_FREE where BD_CATEGORY = #{bd_category} order by Doc_no desc) e) ev left join user_info u on ev.user_id = u.user_id where rn between #{start} and #{end} order by Doc_no desc

select ev.*, u.user_name,rn from (select rownum rn, e.* from (select * from BD_FREE where BD_CATEGORY like #{bd_category} and user_id like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by Doc_no desc) e) ev left join user_info u on ev.user_id = u.user_id where rn between #{start} and #{end} order by Doc_no desc

select count(*) from (select rownum rn, e.* from (select * from BD_FREE where BD_CATEGORY like #{bd_category} and user_id like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by Doc_no desc) e) ev left join user_info u on ev.user_id = u.user_id
